title: Don't Look at Them (6R39)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gollum
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Spot Smeagol and discard 3 cards from hand to wound a minion Smeagol is skirmishing once (or twice if that minion is a [Wraith] minion).
Lore:	”'You should not look in when the candles are lit.'”
Rarity:	R
